Uses of Class
dto.ApiResponse

Packages that use ApiResponse
Package
Description
controller
REST API controllers for the Internship Placement Management System.
dto
Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for API communication.

  • Uses of ApiResponse in dto

    Methods in dto that return ApiResponse
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <T> ApiResponse<T>
    ApiResponse.error()
    Creates an error response with default message.
    static <T> ApiResponse<T>
    ApiResponse.error(String message)
    Creates an error response with message.
    static <T> ApiResponse<T>
    ApiResponse.success(T data)
    Creates a successful response with data and default message.
    static <T> ApiResponse<T>
    ApiResponse.success(T data, String message)
    Creates a successful response with data and custom message.
